  * ADD LIQUIDITY

TOKEN:
  * Symbol: MEME
  * Anti-whale  (0.1% Max total supply transfer amount)
  * 5% Transfer Fee - 2% Burned, 3% added to liquidity
  * 500 Tokens Pre-mined: 400 to LP & 100 For Promotions and Costs
  * Liquidity Locked: 0xB6b9f14A318063BA44D5f21D34fEF0E1016ECA8c

FARMING:
  * Masterchef: 0x1A7Cee127cF9ABc8586e422d8ab5e336298D0472
  * Farming Starts on Block: 15766069 — Tuesday, Jun 15th 10 PM UTC
  * Harvest Start on  Block: 15895669 - Friday,  Jun 18th 10 PM UTC
  * Harvest Cooldowns:
      - Native:     12 Hours
      - Non-Native: 20 Hours

DEPOSIT FEES:
  * 0% On Native Farms
  * 2% On Non-Native Farms

NOTES:
  * dQUICK has no liquidity pool so token price and market cap will be 0. This does not affect farming rewards!
  * Use 6% slippage when swapping tokens due to transfer fee.
